rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0002
rows.name:
How was it, Homura?
Were you able to talk
with them?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, we had a nice,
relaxed conversation.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0004
rows.name: What did you talk about?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0005
rows.name:
Everything that's happened since
I met you.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0006
rows.name:
And I told them not to worry
because I'll be looking after you
properly from now on.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0007
rows.name:
What are you talking about?
I can look after myself
just fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0008
rows.name: That won't do.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0009
rows.name:
Because if you are left alone,
you'll only do
reckless things.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0010
rows.name:
Hohoho!
Already acting like his wife,
aren't you, Homura?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0011
rows.name: Hey! Gramps!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0012
rows.name:
W-wife!? That's not what
I was trying to...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0013
rows.name: Ahahaha! It's a joke.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, dealing with Rex
probably requires that kind of
assertiveness, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0015
rows.name: Come on, Seiryuu-san!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0016
rows.name:
Anyway, we're done here, right?
Let's get going.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0017
rows.name:
Oh? We're leaving already?
Couldn't we stay and chat
a bit longer?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0018
rows.name:
We can talk when we get back,
can't we?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0019
rows.name:
We rarely get the chance
to talk alone like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0020
rows.name:
But with Gramps here,
we're not exactly alone,
are we?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0021
rows.name:
What's that?
Are you saying an old man is in the way?
Should I leave?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0022
rows.name:
That's not what we meant at all!
You're being mean, Seiryuu-san!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0023
rows.name: Hohoho! Youth is a beautiful thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0024
rows.name:
So, what did you want to talk about,
Homura?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0025
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0026
rows.name: Do you miss your mom and dad?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0027
rows.name: Have you always sent money home?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0101
rows.name:
My parents?
Why do you want to know about that?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, being a Blade,
I don't know much about parents.
I was curious what it's like.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0103
rows.name: Hmm, that's hard to explain...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0104
rows.name:
Everything I know about my parents
comes from what Gramps
and Aunt Correl have told me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0105
rows.name:
To be honest,
I barely remember them, so it all feels
a bit distant to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0106
rows.name:
..Doesn't that make
you feel lonely?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0107
rows.name:
Well, I can't say it's not lonely,
but I've never really
dwelled on it.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0108
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0109
rows.name:
After all, it was Gramps and
the villagers who raised me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0110
rows.name:
To me, everyone in the village
is my family.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0111
rows.name:
With all these mothers, fathers,
and siblings around me,
I've never felt lonely.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0112
rows.name:
Though having such a big family
meant getting scolded by someone
almost daily.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0113
rows.name: Sh-shut up!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0201
rows.name:
Yeah, I've been sending money
back home regularly since I left
and got established as a salvager.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0202
rows.name:
I mean, look around.
This village has hardly anything,
doesn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0203
rows.name:
Their trade with other countries
is minimal, and self-sufficiency
only goes so far.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0204
rows.name:
Even with my meager earnings,
I think it's better than nothing.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0205
rows.name:
But it must be difficult for you too,
living like this, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0206
rows.name: You don't have to push yourself so hard...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0207
rows.name:
Hmm, that's true,
but they're all family
so I can't ignore them.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0208
rows.name: Family? You mean the villagers?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0209
rows.name:
Yes, everyone in the village
is like family to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0210
rows.name: So I have to help them!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0211
rows.name:
Everyone in the village
is grateful to you too.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0212
rows.name:
That troublemaker has grown up
to be quite respectable.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0213
rows.name: The "troublemaker" part is unnecessary!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0301
rows.name: ...Hehe.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0302
rows.name:
What?
Homura, don't laugh too.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0303
rows.name: I wasn't making fun of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0304
rows.name:
I just think that's such a typical
Rex-way of looking 
at things - it's admirable.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0305
rows.name:
It makes me wish I had a big family
like yours, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0306
rows.name:
What are you talking about?
Homura, you're family too,
aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0307
rows.name:
...Oh? Is this a confession
in a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0308
rows.name:
Making such a declaration
in front of your parents - you're
braver than I thought, Rex!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0309
rows.name: Wha-?! Rex, what are you saying...?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0310
rows.name: N-no! That's not what I was trying to say!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0311
rows.name: Nia, Meleph, Zeke, and ah, Tora too...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0312
rows.name: All of you are already family to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0313
rows.name:
So I'm saying there's no reasonn	o feel lonely!
That's what I meant!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0314
rows.name:
Well well, no courage after all.
You've got your work cut out for you,
Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0315
rows.name: ...Hehehe. Yes, I'm prepared for it.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0316
rows.name:
Hey!
What are you two going on about?
Come on!
